alert.note: Alert for North Bay Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued December 09 at 8:13AM PST until December 10 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28. For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 33 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...North Bay Interior Valleys. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 10 AM PST this morning. For the Frost Advisory, from midnight tonight to 10 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation, possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing, and create hazardous conditions for livestock and those without adequate heating or shelter.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
